website_summaries.verdict: The best budget drop slot safe that offers a good balance of space and security.
pros: Thick metal siding keeps contents safe from most common forms of tampering
Locking mechanism is extremely durable and simple to use
cons: Limited to holding narrow objects that fit through the slot

customer_reviews.title: Good but too light to leave unscrewed, too heavy to mount, too small to screw into masonry floors
customer_reviews.text: Good build, size and design for our need, but bottom holes for masonry screws to mount this little thing on concrete floors?! Are you kidding me?! Who's going to bend over to drop whatever in it? They should have holes on the back of it for wall mount, perhaps with clear warning that a sheet rock wall in unlike to hold its weight. I'd say, think of creative mounting solution before you buy
customer_reviews.author: ShopNowThinkLater

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these. One has been working OK for over 5 years. The lock requires two keys, which is pretty-much useless for most people in most cases. It's an annoying feature that is overkill for a drop safe. The second safe worked OK for 4 months until the lock literally refused to open. Took it to a locksmith who couldn't get it to work. So...my $80 safe cost me $200 to have a locksmith crack in order to recover a few thousand bucks. Will never buy Sentry again.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer By Day

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof? NOT
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid, heavy design, but it is NOT designed to be mounted outdoors. Rain gets in there very easily. I put a plastic box lid over the top and it still gets wet. I get the impression that someone took a really well designed item and cheapened it by leaving out features, like a seal around the door, or a backwards sloping inward slot so that it sheds rainwater. Maybe a hood on top that extends out, or a flap, or a seal around the door? The double-lock system works, and it's a great idea, but it is rather flimsy. I would buy it again because is is very heavy, but you would be advised to make it waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT D.

customer_reviews.title: Key stopped working, had to break in, it went very easily.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to be our overnight cash box, worked great, though the 2nd key was annoying to fool with. 1.5 months in operation, opened and closed about 10 times a week, 2nd key stopped working before we opened for an evening. It had our cash drawer change so it was either reject cash or break in. The hinge on the outside is a fatal flaw, using a dremmel and hammer/chistel I was able to dismantle the hinge, allowing the front to pop open easy. 15 min of effort.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to keep each other's hands off of the joint money and to actually start saving money for once! Keeps us from touching the money when we aren't in agreement about how/whether it should be spent!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great safe. Two key design will not let you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Two key design will not let you accidentally leave the safe unlocked - you have to pull out the bottom key after locking or unlocking the safe with the top key, if you accidentally leave it unlocked, it will pull open. Also convenient for small cash or paper deposits without having to open the safe. Very small slot though, only suitable for paper items really.
customer_reviews.author: IPau1

customer_reviews.title: You are definitely getting what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good safe... it’s heavy and not very easy to walk away with. It has a two key opening system which is good if you are someone looking for something to be locked up tight but bad if you want to get to your money quickly. The door opens up and down and it is heavy just like the safe... and I can truly say it would be tough to break into it so you better not lose your keys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya C.

customer_reviews.title: Works OK!
customer_reviews.text: I like the safe, very sturdy, but getting the keys in the slots to unlock it is a real PAIN! It is made very sloppy to accept the keys, not like a real lock, it is made with a slot that is very loose. It's ok, but find one that has a real lock! Sorry, I would not recommend this safe. Thank you, HK
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Either the product shipped with the incorrect keys or the tumblers were broken prior to me receiving the product. Out of the box the keys would not unlock the safe. Very disappointing, will not be purchasing any SentrySafe products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Beck

customer_reviews.title: good product. I bought this as a replacement drop ...
customer_reviews.text: good product. I bought this as a replacement drop box for one of our parks.. the drop slot is too big. thieves have figured out how to fish the money out of the slot. I ended up welding a piece of flat bar across the new box making it narrower. the locking mechanism is good. have had several unsuccessful attempts with screwdrivers and chisels to get into it.I had to cut the hinge to get into the old one and just decided it was to worn out and purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: blaze2200

customer_reviews.title: This little safe is pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This little safe is pretty good for the price. My only complaint is the key component. Locking and unlocking it is rather tricky. Probably should just get a digital locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great for small cash deposit using small envelopes for cash. Cons: Cheaply made lock and keys. Overall: A set of keys that was shipped with the safe arrived bent. I can easily bend them with my hand. I guess that's what you get for buying cheaply mad Chinese products. :(
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: once you learn the key sequence (in 5 seconds) it's easy peesy.
customer_reviews.text: Small and discrete but heavy duty. You have to learn the key sequence, which is an added security feature. I had it bolted to the floor by a locksmith and even he had trouble with the keys at first. Have to read the manual, once you learn the key sequence (in 5 seconds) it's easy peesy.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin Magilicuty

customer_reviews.title: Forced Savings Depository Safe....Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for that couple who has a hard time saving!!! One key for myself,and the other for the hubby. Thats a forced savings if I've ever seen one. Now if they'd only make a DUAL KEY ONLY fire proof safe. I'd pay a pretty penny for one of those. Opening this up to put the cash in a fire proof bag defeats the purpose enough that it's a bit disappointing, but otherwise I love it! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised...I guess I just needed a larger safe.
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I had higher expectations for this safe. It advertised what it was, but in my head, I suppose I had pictured it a tad larger. It does it's job and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Erai88

customer_reviews.title: Key stopped working after a year. Called support and ...
customer_reviews.text: Key stopped working after a year. Called support and their only recommendation was to oil the mechanism (it didn't help) and take it to a shop to replace the lock. The cost to replace the lock was almost the same as a new safe, so I ended up having to take a saw to the top. Turns out this can be chopped up with a simple Sawzall in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SD Pitas

customer_reviews.title: perfect safe for office
customer_reviews.text: installation is not that simple, but once installed it is the perfect safe for office
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: The locks are not great quality. Although the lock is a bolt on ...
customer_reviews.text: Be warned. The locks are not great quality. Although the lock is a bolt on part the manufacturer does NOT sell replacement locks. If the lock goes wrong, as mine did, you may as well throw the safe away. I would look at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe for my Retail Business
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble with the directions because they didnt seem to match up with the key combination but luckily they have a good customer service department that was able to walk me through. Just an update: I'm so happy to have this safe. It's secure and small so I can discreetly make money drops without attention. I feel safe with the extra security of 2 keys necessary to open, easily opens, just don't loose the keys!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It a safe
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a good safe I say this is a good one. Very strong and sturdy your mount on any surface. It does come with accessories to mount it on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible keys!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible keys!! Such a pain to open. I spend way too much time trying to open this. Horrible locking mechanism. Such a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Verified Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great! No issues with it and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Petty

customer_reviews.title: These work great in our business
customer_reviews.text: These work great in our business. The anchors that come with the safes are specifically for anchoring into concrete so if you plan to anchor into other material you will need to purchase these fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Deposit safe
customer_reviews.text: Really great when you have unsupervised employees handling cash and checks or you have multiple crews or shifts that might be tempted to "borrow" some cash. Wish there was a single lock version available, with this version I have to carry both keys. Good feature when its employees handling cash and not the owner.
customer_reviews.author: WAR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic safe! 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I was sort of hesitant to buy this item as some of the reviews said how small this safe was. Imagine my surprise when I opened the safe and saw how roomy this safe is. This safe meets all of our needs, from the double key entry the baffle and the size. Surprisingly heavy also. This is a great product. Will last many years and is exactly what I was hoping for when i ordered it. yes i would reccomend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this everyday for a month or so. It's perfect. It's much sturdier and heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not for money
customer_reviews.text: All u have to do is shake the contents out no security at all
customer_reviews.author: Rashida Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This safe is great for a roadside stand, door is ultra rugged
customer_reviews.author: Erik jewett

customer_reviews.title: Thieves can break into it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a fruit stand as a cash box and I it was broken into with a crow bar. They used it on the hinges and were able to bend them back to break it open. I looked at the warranty info and it looks like it only covers damage from fire.
customer_reviews.author: juliak

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then shown in picture.
customer_reviews.text: We will make this product work; however, the "small" size safe shows a small safe, the "medium" size shows a larger safe then the dimensions. We wanted the larger (taller) safe for our business. Make sure you double check all dimensions before you purchase this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid; Weird Key
customer_reviews.text: It works as you'd expect - very sturdy and secure. The dual key system is nice, but they keys are awkward and it's a pain to turn them at the same time. But it's cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Adriance

customer_reviews.title: Great but the 2 keys are confusing
customer_reviews.text: Great safe but I don’t see any need for 2 keys. Didn’t want that part of the deposit box but liked the other features so I went with this one. Would give it an A+ if it had just one key to open.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Best buy ever! It keeps you from taking your money out of the safe with 2 keys and it certainly is a pain for someone to try to steal
customer_reviews.author: home schooler

customer_reviews.title: Is really good to have if you plan on saving a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Is really good to have if you plan on saving a lot of money but the lock is hard to open first unlock the bottom lock first and then unlock the top lock keep the key in at all times the open
customer_reviews.author: arika spraggins

customer_reviews.title: Sentry Small Safe
customer_reviews.text: The drop slot is not big enough to accept rolled coins. This is a good, sturdy, small safe. Two different keys are required to open it. Key action is smooth. It does not require batteries or electricity. It screws to the floor in 4 places. Screws can only be accessed when the safe is open.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great little safe - Perfect for vehicle if size fits needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cheapest safe of its kind out there (I've seen this same safe, albeit under a different name, for over $210). Solid construction, as advertised. Would give it 5 stars except when opening the door, the top key does not stay retained in the lock - so it will fall out. To close you will have to re-insert the key and twist it to the locked position. Should have been an easy fix and unfortunate that it was an oversight in engineering. My application was to mount in the backseat of an extended cab pickup as a vehicle safe. Way more secure than the other 'vehicle' safes on the market and cheaper too!
customer_reviews.author: smccalib

customer_reviews.title: Great for the church receipts. Dual key a plus.
customer_reviews.text: We use this safe at my church. The differently keyed two key lock fits our rules for handling money. The safe was delivered quickly and in good shape. The opening requires bottom key turn first and then the top key. Door must then be pulled to open. Key insertion is sometimes tough that's why only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small cash drops
customer_reviews.text: We have this for work. Because it's on the smaller size, it's easy to hide so the public can't can't see it. Because of the ability to bolt to ground and the top, it would be extremely hard to steal, and money cannot be stolen- can't fit fingers in. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rose

customer_reviews.title: Save money for your home or perfect for a small business
customer_reviews.text: Loved this safe. It is small but just perfect. You have to have 2 keys to open it. Its perfect for saving money. You give a key to your spouse, friend, anyone that you wouldnt to ask for it unless its an emergency. Bolts to the ground. I use it as a drop for my salon and don't need to worry. Easy to bolt to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great safe. We use it to drop donations
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe. We use it to drop donations. Someone even tried to break into the safe and was unsuccessful. The anti-fishing slot and double key holes are wonderful. This is durable construction and worth ever penny. We are so pleased with this drop safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: It's small but does its job., slot big ...
customer_reviews.text: It's small but does its job., slot big enough for 100 singles won't fit anymore then that... so if you have a large drop will have to split in 2
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my guys to use for their tips it works great. It's heavy another good thing. Sometimes it can be hard to open with the keys but I believe is good. I believe you must align the keys in order to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, no safe is totally safe but for what you spend on this one, bolt it down and you're good to go just make regular deposits is my only suggestion
customer_reviews.author: taylor young

customer_reviews.title: Heave safe. We use it for change and cash ...
customer_reviews.text: Heave safe. We use it for change and cash for the register. Funky keys that take a little to get used to
customer_reviews.author: john k

customer_reviews.title: As advertised Works exactly as I wanted,,, ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised Works exactly as I wanted ,,,, 2 keys slows things down...... In an office environment Probably only needed 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: We have been saving for a big ticket purchase and seem to always find other things to spend our money on. The slot in the front allows us to put money into it with out having to open the entire door. Having 2 different keys that are required to open it is awesome. I have both of one of the keys and my sweetheart has both of the other set. Each of us has to have our key at the same time in order to access the contents so we communicate before hand if we need to dip into our savings. It is heavy enough yet lightweight enough to move it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy! Solid metal. great security features (watch the youtube videos). Comes with bolts to drill into the floor. Good size. I fit a gun, several boxes of 45 rounds, keys, and money inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Prototype

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: A good heavy, small safe. Purchased for a small business in which we had some internal theft from the cash drawer from the previous shift. Now they just put cash in this and the problem is aleviated.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction. Built for a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: A good way to keep nosy people out of your elderly parents mail.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bachur

customer_reviews.title: It is great to keep cash or small items in
customer_reviews.text: This was a safe I bought for my girlfriend to keep her money in from her nannying jobs because she often is paid in cash. It is great to keep cash or small items in. They keys seem kind of cheaply made but the safe is very secure so that makes up for the cheapish feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, safe, easy!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I expected and I am very happy with this safe! The safe comes with four bolts and is easy to secure. (ALWAYS BOLT YOUR SAFE DOWN!) if you don't bolt it down what is the point of having it at all?
customer_reviews.author: Porter Anthony Esq.

customer_reviews.title: No frills but very effective safe.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, weight, durability. I own a restaurant and I am in it everyday with ZERO problems getting in. Comes with 2 sets of keys!!! Might get one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well made, and designed unit. Will buy again if need be
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miller

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid safe. Both sets of keys no longer unlock the safe after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Carver

customer_reviews.title: Sentry Safe.  Two keys required
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for husband and now he has misplaced both keys. But at least he's saving money, just can't get in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works well for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works well for what I need.... the only thing that I might say is the keys are kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: tough
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this safe, it is very robust, the ups delivery guy was struggling, It even comes with concrete floor anchors to secure it. the locks work great and the door hinges nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fast shipping, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction. Heavy gauge steel construction. Locking mechanism secure, comes with two sets of keys. Bottom key must remain inserted into lock (quarter turn) for the top lockset to open the door. Cumbersome when both keys need to be on the same key chain (my only complaint).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Small and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and price of this safe. It has two locks and isnt easily tampered with. The only drawback is that it can be kind of confusing which way key goes and they arent really strong and may bend; but they give you 2 sets.
customer_reviews.author: consummate buyer

customer_reviews.title: No batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a Keyed drop safe an this was the perfect size. I had to grind open a safe where an electronic lock failed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect fit...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great and is Heavy Duty... Fingers will get stuck if you try to stick them in the slot... for real!
customer_reviews.author: amazonin'

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a store where u can’t be there to watch the money all the time.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Big Solid safe. Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for saving money. Bigger than I thought. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: had this safe for a long time and I wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: had this safe for a long time and I wouldn't trade it to anyone very durable and tricky to open which makes it hard to be broken in to
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: I wish there were a version that works with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were a version that works with a single key. We use it to drop church offerings and keep them there until the treasurer can pick them up
customer_reviews.author: Hernan D. Hammerly

customer_reviews.title: It's built like a tank and very secure
customer_reviews.text: This safe is exactly what I needed. It's built like a tank and very secure. My only dislike is with the keys, they are a little tricky to get into the locks, but I would still give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: For this price you can’t get anything better only problem is they made it with two keys that fall out while you’re opening it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Reiner

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping cash safe at business
customer_reviews.text: Awesome safe for storing cash at your home or business. Employees can easily drop cash into the safe at the end of the day for your retrieval.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Money slot is not 100% fish proof
customer_reviews.text: Money some times doesn’t go all the way in but over all a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, solid drop safe. I use two of them in my restaurant, and they give the staff (and myself) an added sense of security. Afford-ably priced, the safe comes with hefty lag bolts that make it impossible to move (or remove).
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This safe was much more sturdy than I originally had thought, very pleased with the initial quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cjreche

customer_reviews.title: Works, money goes in the hole, keys open the door to retrieve the money
customer_reviews.text: The money went in the hole, dishonest persons hands are not small enough to steal the money.
customer_reviews.author: AllAboutThisProduct

customer_reviews.title: Size is small.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Too small, can hold in both hands.
customer_reviews.author: Bondine Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Very secure!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for....Bought this one and the larger one. Bolted the small one to the top of the big one and bolted the big one into the concrete floor. These suckers ain't going anywhere!!! Love them. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Edie Warren

customer_reviews.title: failed. twice.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second of these. Within 2 months they could not be unlocked. We had to cut into both. They would be great if they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Strong...safe...secure
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this drop box ..construction is no nonsense ..well thought out ...works flawlessly ..provided mounting hardware works well
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and well made. It has a back ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and well made. It has a back up lock thing so if someone were to bash in the keyholes, the door would seal up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: SentrySafe
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we were looking for and for the right price. Other places wanted hundreds of dollars. Its been perfect for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: SECURITY
customer_reviews.text: THE SAFE BOX DOESN'T WORK AT ALL, THE DOOR OPENS EASILY IF YOU JUST MOVE THE BOX VERY BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Manouchehr R.

customer_reviews.title: Great safes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for....Bought this one and the smaller one. Bolted the small one to the top of the big one and bolted the big one into the concrete floor. These suckers ain't going anywhere!!! Love them. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Edie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly what I was looking for. Functions as a temporary safe and works well and easy to attach to solid desk.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Decent safe, ok security. Better then a sentry safe chest. Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Mounting hardware (masonry anchors), two sets of two keys (depository and lock), anti-fish baffle, drop slot and everything you need to go. Just remember to place depository key in first, turn, then place lock key in and boom its open.
customer_reviews.author: Ejstech

customer_reviews.title: The safe key lock jams up and will not open ...
customer_reviews.text: The safe key lock jams up and will not open. Do not buy....Sorry it is junk....My bartenders could not get their money out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement keys are $50 + tax.
customer_reviews.text: I just called Sentrysafe to inquire on a backup set of replacement keys, and was told they would be $50 + tax. That is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Great size & weight. I love the slot, allows me to pick up money whenever I need it but my employees can drop multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Berube

customer_reviews.title: just right for me
customer_reviews.text: this is a solid drop safe. it came with bolt downs and all.well constructed and not thin cheap steel. good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Helpful reference
customer_reviews.text: On time. Not as big as I expected it. I love it. Helpful reference: don't forget to insert the receipt or the invoice
customer_reviews.author: Pierre P.

customer_reviews.title: drop safe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased for my Real Estate locations, easily mounted and using it for cash and checks that are dropped off for rental payments. Makes my staff more comfortable with handling the payments. Eric
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy build. Easy to fasten down
customer_reviews.text: 2 keys a bit of a nuisance for our application but ok. very sturdy build. Easy to fasten down.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the deposit safe. The construction material is very strong and I do not believe it can be broken into with common tools. The dual key system appears to be durable also. We are using the deposit box to collect monthly rent. We were out of town this month during the deposit drop time and we were pleased to find all our rents safe inside upon our return from out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to get stuff out
customer_reviews.text: If it can fit in, it can fit out...needs a flap to keep things in, once it’s in.
customer_reviews.author: Gresham Family

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Keeps us from "borrowing" from the savings because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Keeps us from "borrowing" from the savings because we need our spouse's key to get in. Seems well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good safe.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Solid and heavy. Product came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sahkneeyou

customer_reviews.title: This is useless
customer_reviews.text: Someone broke into my store and fished out all the enveoples we had inside with a broken umbrella handle. DO NOT BUY THIS SAFE. It is useless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money..
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as i thought it was gonna be but it is definitly solid & secure. It was designed to discourage you from getting in it it is hard as hell to open..

customer_reviews.title: Great safe to keep your valuables in at home
customer_reviews.text: Great safe to keep your valuables in at home. I guess you could also use it at work or the office to. Sturdy design will last for years.

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: The product was perfect for our use. It is a little small but it is just right for our purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Poor handling.
customer_reviews.text: Out of 4 boxes I purchased, keys for 2 boxes were missing and we had to change the locks. Poor handling.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this safe!!!! If your going back and forth GET IT!!

product_meta.title: SentrySafe Depository Safe, Medium Dual Key Lock Money Safe with Drop Slot, 0.38 Cubic Feet, UC-039K
product_meta.description:
Size:0.38 cu ft (medium)The SentrySafe Depository Safe is a must have for security conscious business managers. It's uniquely designed to protect cash receipts, deposit slips, keys and other valuables against theft and burglaries at the point of purchase.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Sentry Safe drop slot safe has a solid steel construction and a powder coat finish. The drop slot comes with a anti-fishing slot, anti-pry door, dual key lock and bottom side piano hinge. The safe has pre-drilled anchor hole so the safe can be bolted to the ground. The bolt down kit is included. This safe is great for business or home use.
feature_bullets: DROP SLOT SAFE: Medium depository safe provides protection for cash, receipts, deposit slips, keys and other valuables against theft and burglaries; ideal for convenience stores, restaurants, bars hotels/motels and more
KEY LOCK: Money safe has dual key lock, requiring both keys to unlock unit to ensure valuables remain protected against theft

SECURITY: Safe is equipped with anti-fish hopper to prevent cash and deposits from being stolen during storage; a must have for security conscious business managers; bolt down hardware (included) to help prevent removal of your personal safe
DURABLE DESIGN: Solid steel construction protects cash and deposits against drill attacks, and the continuous hinge helps prevent prying the door open
SPACIOUS INTERIOR: Medium depository safe secures all items at point of purchase; Interior: 10 in. H x 7.8 in. W x 8.5 in. D, exterior: 12 in. H x 8 in. W x 10.3 in. D
